attributes.action: 100year old Captain Tom Moore to be knighted for raising millions for the NHS
attributes.additional_details: We are in the midst of a global pandemic and its a huge heartfelt gesture from Captain Tom Moore...... He hasn't long left so let us give him some payback!!
attributes.background:
Veteran Captain Tom Moore has walked around his garden to raise money for our NHS
At 100 years old he has became a national hero...... And raised millions (15 million so far) I would like to see him receive a knighthood or similar recognition for his service to the the country and the NHS

rejection.details:
We know lots of people want to petition for Colonel Moore to receive an honour, but the Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition.

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
